answers.answer: I HAVE MULTIPLE CYSTS ON BOTH AND THIS DISEASE IS A SLUGGISH AFFECT OF THE BODY EVERYTHING IS NOT SECRETING PROPERLY , I HAVE PCOD WITH ONSET OF DIABETES AND ITS VERY SERIOUS , THE ULTRASOUND U/S - OTHER SYMPTOMS ARE FACIAL HAIR , WT GAIN, FATIGUE, HIGH CHOLESTEROL, AND MORE BUT I THINK IVE HAD IT FOR YEARS BECAUSE ALL OF A SUDDEN IN MY THIRTYS I DEVELOPED FACIAL HAIR WHICH I DID NOT HAVE BEFORE. IF I CAN HELP LET E KNOW- BOLD FOR JESUS

question: I recently went for an U/S of my ovaries to check if I have PCOS, I was told by the sonographer that there was "3 average sized cysts" on my right ovary. Can anyone shed any light on this interpretation as I dont see the gynae until Mid april and I'm left wondering...
title: What does the U/S mean?
